content: Virtual Tech Support
A virtual technical support service that provides on-demand technical assistance to students and educators experiencing technical issues during online classes and exams.
24/7 availability, remote support, step-by-step guidance, multi-device compatibility, comprehensive troubleshooting
Geek Squad, HelloTech, Support.com, iYogi, My Computer Works
Specializes in online education technical support service
Smart Online Exam Platform

A smart online exam platform that operates even in low-bandwidth and unreliable internet connectivity situations. The platform uses AI-based algorithms to predict and adjust real-time network issues and provide stable online exam experience.
AI-based network optimization, 99% uptime, user-friendly interface, multi-device compatibility, automated grading
ProProfs Quiz Maker, Quizlet, Google Forms, ExamSoft, Edbase
Operates even in low-bandwidth and unreliable connectivity situations
Virtual Study Buddy

A virtual study buddy AI-based chatbot that assists online students on the platform with their coursework and other academic needs. The chatbot can answer questions, provide explanations, recommend study materials and time management tips.
Natural language processing, 24/7 availability, personalized learning, multi-lingual support, user-friendly interface
Grammarly, Brainly, Quizlet, StudyBlue, CogBooks
Personalized AI-powered learning assistance
All-in-One Virtual Classroom

An all-in-one virtual classroom platform that offers a comprehensive package of features including live streaming, screen sharing, whiteboarding, breakout rooms, student engagement tools, and cloud-based storage solutions. The platform can easily integrate with other educational apps and software.
Live streaming, screen sharing, whiteboarding, breakout rooms, cloud-based storage, attendance tracking
Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Classroom, Schoology, BigBlueButton
Comprehensive package of all necessary tools in a single platform
pain_point_description: technical glitches and internet connectivity issues can interrupt online classes and exams. students may face inconvenience and frustration and even lose their progress or data
